DOC.brief_title: Health Effects Milk Proteins Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: ≥ 70 year age reduce gait speed reduce `` five time sit stand test '' reduce `` timed step stair test `` reduce grip strength Stable body weight ( last 3 month ) Mini Nutritional Assessment ( MNA® ) score ≥ 17 Minimental status ( MMSENR ) score : ≥ 24 Willing participate accord protocol Allergy/intolerance milk/dairy product High intake milk yoghurt Physical active subject Known diabetes type I II , HbA1c ≥ 6,5 % Recent event acute cardiovascular disease include stroke Rapidly evolve disease ( active malignancy ) history cancer ( malignant tumor ) last 3 year . Severe inflammationrelated disease e.g . Crohn disease arthritis Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Increased blood pressure High intake alcohol Reduced kidney function ( GFR < 45 ml/min ) Increased hsCRP , ASAT , ALAT Increased suppress TSH Hormone therapy Systemic use glucocorticosteroids ( antiinflammatory steroid hormone ) . Use spray inhalator use exclusion . Disability prevent physical test Using medication know affect protein metabolism
